body: So in the end, C.C. still won XD

Just finished the series during lockdown, this comic was awesome!

Art is decent and gets the job done, but I really like the characterisation and progression of it. Tasteful.

Anal scene was too short, C2s face was amazing, wish itd gone for longer
4/10 No idea what people find sexually attractive about those abysmal Code Geass character designs. Art isn't even that good

First of all, kingofeverthing I see you every r u a bot, second of all code Geass S3 or S4 (I rlly can't remember anymore) is a lost cause don't get hyped all we have the original anime. The ending of the last season (where lelouch gets 'killed') was damn near perfect so don't expect a better ending. Third of all, don't @ me saying I'm spoiling the anime its almost 2 decades old now
